title: Special Topics in Qualitative Methods
description: This course series addresses special topics in education research and data analysis. Students explore a faculty-specified qualitative research method and analytic approach. Approaches may include case studies, video analysis, mixed methods, naturalistic observations, ethnography, and netnography. The assigned readings include scholarship on the practice and philosophical underpinnings of the specified qualitative research approach and examples of published qualitative studies. Prerequisites: ED82 major or consent of instructor.
